Blog.post: well im at home and its like 11:20 and i dont have much to do...im talking Doanld and he wants to know when i am going to come over this weekend... gosh i dont feel like going really... oh wellz ... i lubberz my azn hottie... wow am i bored... and really tired.. i have been working on my biology project and my Into hst project and im trying to finish everything.. gosh skool is hard but its only getting harder... i want my sexy beast cameron... GRRR!!!!! j/k... wow im pretty bored.. well i got a call from that lady for my job interview today but i wasnt home yet from skool so i called her back but she wasnt there and so i left a message... and i havent heard from her yet so yeah... i guess her calling is a good sign rite??? oh well im tired now so imma go...lata

ok guys sux who ever said they didnt lied... they say that they are going to do all of this stuff and then they never do it they mise well just say that they aint going to do it... and Eric u need to call Monica ur g/f because she is very worried about you... she keeps bothering me and no one knows where u are... u need togo home or call her or sumthing... i mean i like helping out in anyways i can but she IM's me too much sometimes when she is worried about you... just call her cuz if u call me im just going to yell at u some more.. not all guys sux butmost of yall do cuz there are sum good guys but like only 5% out of 100% and then the rest of ya dont think u do but u do... and then when sumone says sumthing about it all u say is " im not anything like that" and yet u r and u just dont know it... stupid Doanld (my b/f) needs to call me cuz the last time i talked to him and he never calls me.. i always have to call him and yet when im with him he tells me how much he likes me and stuff but u know it doesnt always seem true cuz of the stupid stuff he does... and then the whole ppl cheating on each other... dont cheat i mean if u dont wanna be with that person then break up with them...

Winnie the Pooh rox my sox off!! ** all the way ** hehehehe! and the rain rain rain came down down down!! :) ** song 4rm movie ** tut tut, it looks like rain. tut tut it looks like rain! Oh, i'm just a little black rain cloud.. hovering over the honey bees!! oh, i'm just a little black rain cloud... hehehe * another song * right from the moment when i met her, saw her i said shes GORGEOUS and i fell in this town there's only she! whos as beautiful as me! so im making plans to woo and marry belle!!~ ** look there he goes isnt he dreamy?!? monsieur gaston! oh he's so cute! be still my heart... i'm hardly breathing!! :) hehehe im a little eggplant short and shiny here is my green head and there's my purple hiney when i get excited i'm in a trance watch me do my eggplant dance!! i believe i can be... anything i wanna be.. im sitting in a grocery store selling for a dollar four!! look at me, i'm over there i'm talking to a pear!!! :) ** i wish i was an eggplant.. *sigh ** im a dorkhee lil guh whoa... lyke whoaz ... wha wha whoaz... ok.. well i guess that's all for now.. buh byez cruel world!!! *cries* oh!!! im owtx lyke diz ** poof!! ** wha wha .... wh0aZzZzZ!!! tee hee!!! *stix my tongue out at everywun!!!!* wait wait wait!! b4 i go.. i have just one more song i'd like to sing!! sha la la la la la my oh my! looks like the boys too shy aint gonna kiss the girl oh whoa! sha la la la la la aint that sad.. aint it a shame too bad he's gonna miss the girl... now's ur moment... floating in the blue lagoon boy u betta do it soon no time wuld b betta something something something blah blah blah jux go on n kiss the girl~!! ok... well im going to leave u now in the land of disney toons!! buh byez ppl!~!! *huggerz n kisserz!!!!*
